description: Defines a Birthday class representing a user's birthday with fields for identification, name, date, and reminder settings. Includes methods for age calculation, formatting, and serialization.

classes.name: Birthday
classes.description: A model class representing a birthday entry with utility methods for age calculation and data serialization.

methods.name: nextAge
methods.description: Calculates the next age the person will be turning based on the current date.

methods.name: formatted
methods.description: Returns the birthday date formatted as a localized string.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Birthday object into a map for data storage or transmission.

methods.name: Birthday.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Birthday instance from a map.
